titles.title: O Breath Of God (familiar tune - words fit)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh breath of God breathe on us now And move within us while we pray The Spring of our new life art Thou The very light of our new day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh strangely art Thou with us Lord Neither in height nor depth to seek In nearness shall Thy voice be heard Spririt to spirit Thou dost speak{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is our Advocate on high Thou art our Advocate within Oh plead the truth and make reply To every argument of sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But ah this faithless heart of mine The way I know I know my Guide Forgive me O my Friend divine That I so often turn aside{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be with me when no other friend The mystery of my heart can share And be Thou known when fears transcend By Thy best name of Comforter{/lang-eng}
